title: Font ID
content:
Hi, can anyone identify this font please?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071123090922im_/http:/typophile.com/files/image2_4204.jpg)

 [‹ Please help](http://web.archive.org/web/20071123090922/http:/typophile.com/node/39339 "Go to previous forum topic") [Great Type... help me ID ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071123090922/http:/typophile.com/node/39341 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Mint

comments.content: How old is this sample? Could be pre-digital.
I take that back. It’s [Chalet New York 1960](http://web.archive.org/web/20071123090922/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts). Pseudo-pre-digital, then.
